ygData.msgSnippet: DeathSteel:: He steps back and spins the battle blade infront of his body. With the large wing parts of the blade, he uses it like a shield to protect his neck

DeathSteel::

He steps back and spins the battle blade infront of his body. With 
the large wing parts of the blade, he uses it like a shield to 
protect his neck and abdomain. Then he shoves his battle blade 
forward to push Kaiser back. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He shrugs.  "I am not the one being tested here, but if you 
insist."  
> He braces himself and begins his charge at DeathSteel.  His right 
arm holding 
> one blade parallel to the ground and his left blade trailing behind 
him.  As 
> he approaches he draws his right arm back slightly then slashes it 
across at 
> DeathSteel's throat.  His trailing left blade comes in for a 
simultaneous 
> thrust at DeathSteel's abdomen.
